TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit iOS extends System.Object implements class Xamarin.Forms.IConfigPlatform

Docs.summary: Marker class that identifies the iOS platform.

remarks.para: Developers specify the type name of this marker class to the method to specify the underlying iOS control on which to run a platform-specific effect.
